# SceneUnderstandingComponent.Origin

**Enumeration**

Types of scene-understanding origins this component lives in.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Origin
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **SceneUnderstandingComponent.Origin.system**: A scene-understanding component that is owned and created by the system. Component of this origin type will model an object in real world environment.
- **SceneUnderstandingComponent.Origin.user**: A scene-understanding component that is owned and created by the developer. Component of this origin type will model an object in virtual environment.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
